title: Cybernetica
creator_credit: James Ritchie, British Transport Films and Peter M Sims
brief_description: Three young women converge on Paris, exploring as they travel, the wonders of a new age; the new railway age in which computers defeat by the speed of their decision making and contemporary evils of congestion, pollution and wasted space and time. “We can travel all we want, yet leave the land, the air and the sunshine undisturbed.”
